content: Hi Kavy! How's your Monday morning going so far?
my bday date is 7july 2007 and my bestfriend name is Anushka she is female

Happy early birthday in advance, Kavy! So, you're a Cancer, born on July 7, 2007. That's awesome! And it's great to know that you have a special friend like Anushka in your life. What's your favorite thing to do with Anushka?
talking with her . her bday date is 2 fab 2008

That's sweet! It's great that you enjoy talking with Anushka. And wow, I can already see that you two are close, knowing each other's birthdays! Anushka is an Aquarius, born on February 2, 2008. Does she have any fun birthday traditions or plans that you're looking forward to celebrating with her?
